summary: Falcon's Fury is a thrilling drop tower ride at Busch Gardens, Tampa. Standing at 335 feet, it's the tallest drop tower in North America. Riders experience a five-second free fall, reaching 60 mph. The name is inspired by a falcon's swift dive. Originally planned for 2013, it opened in 2014 after delays. The ride has received positive reviews for its height and the rush of the drop.
title: Falcon's Fury
